EmailTemplate.subject: Final two assessments for Youth Assessors next week - sign up now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Huge thanks to everyone who's been a Youth Assessor so far! You've done a brilliant job and have contributed to us being able to hire some exceptional staff for NCS this summer.
Our assessments are now sadly coming to an end: we only have two left this year! That means that we've already hired a record number of staff.
See below for details, and email Ade at the following address if you'd like to sign up:
adewale.solaru@the-challenge.org
There are only three places for Youth Assessors per date, so allocations will be on a first-come-first-served basis.

Look forward to seeing you there!
Megan and Ade
